Destructive Reach.name: Destructive Reach
descriptions: Increases the range of your Destruction spells by 10% and reduces the threat generated by your Destruction spells by 10%.
Increases the range of your Destruction spells by 20% and reduces the threat generated by your Destruction spells by 20%.

Bane.name: Bane
descriptions: Reduces the casting time of your Shadow Bolt by 0.1 sec and your Soul Fire by 0.5 sec.
Reduces the casting time of your Shadow Bolt by 0.2 sec and your Soul Fire by 1 sec.
Reduces the casting time of your Shadow Bolt by 0.3 sec and your Soul Fire by 1.5 sec.
Reduces the casting time of your Shadow Bolt by 0.4 sec and your Soul Fire by 2 sec.
Reduces the casting time of your Shadow Bolt by 0.5 sec and your Soul Fire by 2.5 sec.

Aftermath.name: Aftermath
descriptions: Gives your Destruction spells a 10% chance to daze the target for 5 seconds.
Gives your Destruction spells a 20% chance to daze the target for 5 seconds.
Gives your Destruction spells a 30% chance to daze the target for 5 seconds.

Cataclysm.name: Cataclysm
descriptions: Reduces the Mana cost of your Destruction spells by 5%.
Reduces the Mana cost of your Destruction spells by 10%.
Reduces the Mana cost of your Destruction spells by 15%.

Devastation.name: Devastation
descriptions: Increases the critical strike chance of your Destruction spells by 1%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Destruction spells by 2%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Destruction spells by 3%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Destruction spells by 4%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Destruction spells by 5%.

Demonic Power.name: Demonic Power
descriptions: Reduces the casting time of your Imp's Firebolt spell by 0.5 sec and increases the critical strike chance of your Succubus' Lash of Pain ability by 30%.
Reduces the casting time of your Imp's Firebolt spell by 1 sec and increases the critical strike chance of your Succubus' Lash of Pain ability by 60%.

Intensity.name: Intensity
descriptions: Reduces the chance for enemies to resist your Destruction spells by 2% and gives you a 35% chance to resist interruption caused by damage while casting or channeling any Destruction spell.
Reduces the chance for enemies to resist your Destruction spells by 4% and gives you a 70% chance to resist interruption caused by damage while casting or channeling any Destruction spell.

Ruin.name: Ruin
descriptions: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Destruction spells by 20%.
Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Destruction spells by 40%.
Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Destruction spells by 60%.
Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Destruction spells by 80%.
Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Destruction spells by 100%.

Feeding Demons.name: Feeding Demons
descriptions: Your spell critical strikes have a 50% chance to restore 6 per level Mana to your demon.
Your spell critical strikes have a 100% chance to restore 6 per level Mana to your demon.

Shadowburn.name: Shadowburn
descriptions: Instantly blasts the target for 99 Shadow damage.  If the target dies within 5 seconds of Shadowburn, and yields experience or honor, the caster gains a Soul Shard.

Improved Immolate.name: Improved Immolate
descriptions: Increases the damage done by your Immolate by 5%.
Increases the damage done by your Immolate by 10%.
Increases the damage done by your Immolate by 15%.

Bring the Pain.name: Bring the Pain
descriptions: Increases the critical strike chance of your Searing Pain, Conflagrate and Shadowburn spells by 3%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Searing Pain, Conflagrate and Shadowburn spells by 5%.

Improved Shadow Bolt.name: Improved Shadow Bolt
descriptions: Your Shadow Bolt critical strikes has a 20% chance to increase Shadow damage dealt to the target by 10% for 10 seconds.
Your Shadow Bolt critical strikes has a 40% chance to increase Shadow damage dealt to the target by 10% for 10 seconds.
Your Shadow Bolt critical strikes has a 60% chance to increase Shadow damage dealt to the target by 10% for 10 seconds.
Your Shadow Bolt critical strikes has a 80% chance to increase Shadow damage dealt to the target by 10% for 10 seconds.
Your Shadow Bolt critical strikes has a 100% chance to increase Shadow damage dealt to the target by 10% for 10 seconds.

Pyroclasm.name: Pyroclasm
descriptions: Gives your Rain of Fire, Hellfire, and Soul Fire spells a 20% chance to stun the target for 4 seconds.
Gives your Rain of Fire, Hellfire, and Soul Fire spells a 40% chance to stun the target for 4 seconds.

Conflagrate.name: Conflagrate
descriptions: Ignites a target that is already afflicted by Immolate, dealing 226 Fire damage and consuming the Immolate spell.

Sadism.name: Sadism
descriptions: Your spell critical strikes have a 8% chance to restore 666 Mana.
Your spell critical strikes have a 16% chance to restore 666 Mana.
Your spell critical strikes have a 24% chance to restore 666 Mana.
Your spell critical strikes have a 32% chance to restore 666 Mana.
Your spell critical strikes have a 40% chance to restore 666 Mana.

Mayhem.name: Mayhem
descriptions: When activated, increases the critical strike chance of your next Destruction spell by 100%.

Shadowstorm.name: Shadowstorm
descriptions: Increases the damage done by your Shadow spells by 3%.
Increases the damage done by your Shadow spells by 6%.
Increases the damage done by your Shadow spells by 9%.
Increases the damage done by your Shadow spells by 12%.
Increases the damage done by your Shadow spells by 15%.

Emberstorm.name: Emberstorm
descriptions: Increases the damage done by your Fire spells by 3%.
Increases the damage done by your Fire spells by 6%.
Increases the damage done by your Fire spells by 9%.
Increases the damage done by your Fire spells by 12%.
Increases the damage done by your Fire spells by 15%.

Shock and Awe.name: Shock and Awe
descriptions: Stuns the target for 4 seconds. While stunned, the target receives an additional 10% damage from all sources and cannot be healed.
